column4: Can we expect an official bootsplash for Ubuntu, like SuSE's one? I dont care for bootsplash on a regular desktop computer, but it is important on a laptop.

i am constantly making presentations on international conferences, and I guess you agree that having a bootsplash on my laptop makes it look more professional than having a bunch of characteres scrolling on the screen
sounds reasonable. i don't use a laptop much
